mapper.select: select im.* from inno72_interact_machine im join inno72_interact interact on im.interact_id = interact.id join inno72_interact_machine_time imt on im.id=imt.interact_machine_id where interact.`status` = 1 and im.machine_code= #{machineCode} and CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() BETWEEN imt.start_time and imt.end_time

select im.machine_code as machineCode,m.merchant_code as sellerId from inno72_interact_machine im join inno72_interact_machine_goods img on im.id=img.interact_machine_id left join inno72_goods g on g.id=img.goods_id left join inno72_merchant m on g.seller_id = m.id where img.type = 0 and im.interact_id=#{interactId}
